Any figures that were printed have also been saved in the same folder.

Remarks:
--------------
Here, we see that the Romberg method converged in the 6th row, i.e. 64 slices, to within
an error of 10**(-8), while the trapezoidal method took 11 iterations, i.e. 2048 slices,
to converge to an error limit of 10**(-6).
